item.description:
Get to say things like "all in!" and "I think you're bluffin'!" in a friendly game of Texas Hold'em.

Looking for up to 10 to play from 7 to 10pm Wednesday at Sean's place in Milford (near the Hospital) for a low pressure, low stakes game (will need at least 4 to play).

Sean will Host this Meetup. (Thanks Sean!)

Beginners welcome. $20 buy in (probably play 2 games).

Address and Phone to be emailed Via the Meetup Site to those Signed up at 5pm Wednesday.Â  The e-mail will come to the address you signed up to Meetup with, so expect it there.

Should end in time for those interested in the "Karaoke at the Corner Pocket" event later that night.
item.how_to_find_us: Sean will E-mail (via Meetup account!) the Yes RSVPs with the Address and Phone number.
item.name: Last Minute Poker Game
